languages.text: {n}Молодой человек явно прилагает немало усилий, чтобы выглядеть опрятно — его одежда почти новая и щегольская, волосы уложены. Картину портят плохо оттертые пятна масла из подтекающего {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланта{/g}, и размер нарядного камзола — он явно с чужого плеча.{/n} "Подходите, подходите, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}дорогие гости{/d}! Посмотрите на лучшую коллекцию живых {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} на Футфоле!"

{n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Come one, come all{/d}! See for yourself the best collection of live {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} on Footfall!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой человек явно прилагает немало усилий, чтобы выглядеть опрятно — его одежда почти новая и щегольская, волосы уложены. Картину портят плохо оттертые пятна масла из подтекающего {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланта{/g}, и размер нарядного камзола — он явно с чужого плеча.{/n} "Подходите, подходите, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}дорогие гости{/d}! Посмотрите на лучшую коллекцию живых {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} на Футфоле!"

traits.locale_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look presentable — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well-groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed off oil stains from his leaky implant and the size of the doublet — it was made for someone else.{/n} "Come one, come all, my dear guests! See for yourself the best collection of live xenos on Footfall!"

What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else.{/n} "Come one, come all! languages.text: {n}青年は格好よく見せるためにあらゆる面で努力しているのが見て取れる。洒落た服は新品同様で、髪も手入れされている。しかし、その印象も雑に拭かれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}の油漏れと、明らかに他人のために作られただぼだぼのジャケットのせいで台無しだ。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}さあ、寄ってらっしゃい、見てらっしゃい{/d}！フットフォールで最高の生きる{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}のコレクションだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Come one, come all{/d}! See for yourself the best collection of live {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}青年は格好よく見せるためにあらゆる面で努力しているのが見て取れる。洒落た服は新品同様で、髪も手入れされている。しかし、その印象も雑に拭かれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}の油漏れと、明らかに他人のために作られただぼだぼのジャケットのせいで台無しだ。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}さあ、寄ってらっしゃい、見てらっしゃい{/d}！フットフォールで最高の生きる{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}のコレクションだ！」

languages.text: {n}很显然，这个年轻人尽其所能，让自己看起来是个正派人。他时髦的衣服几乎是全新的，头发也修剪得很整齐。不过，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}侧漏出的油渍清洗得相当不干净，夹克看起来也很不合身，尺寸显然是为其他人量身定做的。这些细节破坏了他体面的形象。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}过来看看吧！都过来看看！{/d}整个落脚港最美妙的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}藏品，都在这里！”
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Come one, come all{/d}! See for yourself the best collection of live {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，这个年轻人尽其所能，让自己看起来是个正派人。他时髦的衣服几乎是全新的，头发也修剪得很整齐。不过，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}侧漏出的油渍清洗得相当不干净，紧身衣看起来也很不合身，尺寸显然是为其他人量身定做的。这些细节破坏了他体面的形象。{/n}“过来看看吧！都过来看看！整个落脚港最美妙的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}藏品，都在这里！”

languages.text: {n}Salta a la vista que el joven se esmera por dar buena imagen. Su ropa nueva sigue las tendencias y lleva un peinado muy conseguido. Dicha impresión queda arruinada por las manchas de aceite de su {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} agujereado y la talla de la chaqueta, que claramente fue elaborado con otra persona en mente.{/n} «¡{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Pasen y vean{/d}! ¡Contemplen la mejor colección de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} vivos de todo Paso!».
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Come one, come all{/d}! See for yourself the best collection of live {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Salta a la vista que el joven se esmera por dar buena imagen. Su ropa nueva sigue las tendencias y lleva un peinado muy conseguido. Dicha impresión queda arruinada por las manchas de aceite de su {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} agujereado y el talle del jubón, que claramente fue elaborado con otra persona en mente.{/n} «¡Pasen y vean! ¡Contemplen la mejor colección de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} vivos de todo Paso!».

languages.text: {n}Le jeune homme a manifestement fait des efforts pour paraître élégant : ses vêtements à la mode sont presque neufs et ses cheveux, méticuleusement coiffés. Cependant, cette apparence soignée est démentie par des taches d'huile mal nettoyées provenant de son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} et par la coupe douteuse de sa veste, manifestement confectionnée pour quelqu'un d'autre.{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Approchez, approchez{/d} ! Venez découvrir de vos propres yeux la plus grande ménagerie de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} vivants de Castel ! »
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Come one, come all{/d}! See for yourself the best collection of live {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune homme a manifestement fait des efforts pour paraître élégant : ses vêtements à la mode sont presque neufs et ses cheveux, méticuleusement coiffés. Cependant, cette apparence soignée est démentie par des taches d'huile mal nettoyées provenant de son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} et par la coupe douteuse de son pourpoint, manifestement confectionné pour quelqu'un d'autre.{/n} « Approchez, approchez ! Venez découvrir de vos propres yeux la plus grande ménagerie de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} vivants de Castel ! »

languages.text: {n}Dieser junge Mann gibt sich offensichtlich große Mühe, adrett auszusehen – seine modische Kleidung ist praktisch neu, und seine Haare sind sehr gepflegt. Getrübt wird dieser Eindruck durch die unzureichend entfernten Ölflecken von seinem leckenden {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g} und der Passform der Jacke, die eindeutig für jemand anderen angefertigt wurde.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Kommt nur, kommt alle her{/d}! Seht mit eigenen Augen die beste Sammlung lebender {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} auf Footfall!"
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Come one, come all{/d}! See for yourself the best collection of live {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dieser junge Mann gibt sich offensichtlich große Mühe, adrett auszusehen – seine modische Kleidung ist praktisch neu, und seine Haare sind sehr gepflegt. Getrübt wird dieser Eindruck durch die unzureichend entfernten Ölflecken von seinem leckenden {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g} und der Größe des Wamses, das eindeutig für jemand anderen angefertigt wurde.{/n} "Kommt nur, kommt alle her! Seht mit eigenen Augen die beste Sammlung lebender {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} auf Footfall!"

{n}Dieser junge Mann gibt sich offensichtlich große Mühe, adrett auszusehen – seine modische Kleidung ist praktisch neu, und seine Haare sind sehr gepflegt. Getrübt wird dieser Eindruck durch die unzureichend entfernten Ölflecken von seinem leckenden {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g} und der Passform der Jacke, die eindeutig für jemand anderen angefertigt wurde.{/n} "Kommt nur, kommt alle her! Seht mit eigenen Augen die beste Sammlung lebender {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} auf Footfall!"

languages.text: {n}Bu genç adam belli ki janti görünmek için elinden geleni yapmış. Son moda kıyafetleri epey yeni sayılır, saçı da gayet düzgün taranmış. Yaratmaya çalıştığı izlenimi bozan şey ise yağ akıtan {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantından{/g} kaynaklı, gelişigüzel silinmiş lekeler ve üzerine oturmayan, başka birisi için dikildiği belli olan ceketi.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Gel vatandaş gel{/d}! Binliman'daki en muhteşem canlı {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} koleksiyonunu görmeden geçme!"
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Come one, come all{/d}! See for yourself the best collection of live {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu genç adam belli ki alımlı görünmek için elinden geleni yapıyor; son moda kıyafetleri oldukça yeni sayılır ve saçı gayet düzgün taranmış. Yaratmaya çalıştığı izlenimi bozan şey ise yağ akıtan {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}ından kaynaklı, gelişigüzel silinmiş lekeler ve üzerine oturmayan, başka birisi için dikildiği belli olan ceketi.{/n} "Duyduk duymadık demeyin! Binliman'daki en muhteşem canlı {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} koleksiyonunu kendi gözlerinizle görün!"
